document_data.name: Summon Minion
document_data.mainbody: '''''Summon divine minion''''', known as simply '''''summon minion''''' prior to the [[Time of Troubles]], was a [[divine magic|divine]] [[southern magic]] [[spell]] available to [[priest]]s of the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]].
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the caster to summon a single [[divine minion]]. The divine minion obeyed the commands of the caster, including sacrificing its own life, as long as the commands did not violate the edits of the minion's [[deity]].
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Somatic component|somatic]] and [[Verbal component|verbal]] components, this spell required [[material component]]s. These took the form of a large [[gem]] with a value of at least 1,000 [[gold piece]]s and the caster's [[holy symbol]]. The gem was consumed by the spell during casting as a sacrifice to the deity of the requested divine minion.
document_data.Notable Users:
* The [[avatar]]s of every Mulhorandi deity could cast ''summon minion'' twice per day.
* The [[incarnation]]s of every Mulhorandi deity could cast ''summon minion'' once per day.
* The [[pharaoh]]s of Mulhorand, all being incarnations of [[Horus-Re]], were capable of casting ''summon minion''.
